I'm new to the group, so forgive me if this has been posted.

I'm running JUnit when I do an Ant build. Works geat... creates XML 
files whenever it gets a failure. I can go into the files and check 
out the errors, not problem... but is anyone aware of a parser that 
will take all the files and put them in one report that is a little 
more friedly to view?

Thanks
